posts.author: SorcerousSally
posts.content:
Our table uses a house rule for uses where we allow more flexibility in how it's applied. It's been working well so far.

The way I understand the rules for uses, it should work like this: when you take the action, you need to roll ability checks to determine the outcome.

I think the 2024 changes to uses make it much more balanced compared to before.

I actually disagree with some of the previous comments about uses. Based on my experience, it works differently.
